scripts.build-win: cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack -p --config ./client/webpack/webpack.config.js && go-bindata -o ./server/bindata.go assets/... ./server/templates/... && gox -cgo -osarch="windows/amd64" -output=dist/web_{{.OS}}_{{.Arch}} ./server/...
scripts.build-linux: cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack -p --config ./client/webpack/webpack.config.js && go-bindata -o ./server/bindata.go assets/... ./server/templates/... && gox -cgo -osarch="linux/amd64" -output=dist/web_{{.OS}}_{{.Arch}} ./server/...
